newsitem.title: USA: Clinton in hospital with "minor" injury.
newsitem.headline: Clinton in hospital with "minor" injury.

text.p: President Bill Clinton was taken to hospital early on Friday with a "minor injury", U.S. officials said.
There was no immediate official word on his condition.
Clinton was staying at the home of Australian golfer Greg Norman at Hobe Sound, Florida. He was taken to St Mary's hospital in West Palm Beach in the middle of the night.
U.S. officials said only that the president's injury was a minor one. No further information was immediately available on the nature of his ailment.
Clinton, 50, was reelected to a second term of office last November. He is due to meet Russian President Boris Yeltsin in Helsinki next week.
